summary: So now it’s time to summarize the most recent chapter in the ongoing saga of The Lizard. So last time we saw our favorite mad...
body:
So now it’s time to summarize the most recent chapter in the ongoing saga of The Lizard.

So last time we saw our favorite mad scientist, someone Marvel claims is a reanimated Ben Reilly brought back Martha and Billy Connors from the death (by clone logic they shouldn’t be the real Martha and Billy but clones but whatever let’s appreciate what we have) but then all the clones in Clone Conspiracy started melting so Curt saved them by injecting them with Lizard formula; and if you remember I threw my hands in the air and shouted at the idiot.

Now turns out that turned out fine. Actually the next time we saw Curt was at the beginning of the Nick Spencer run; and yes it’s Hydra Cap Nick Spencer, but he’s reining in the comic so I don’t know how I feel about it. Anyway Curt shows up and he’s teaching again and got a chip that allows him to become human again, and I was like “hey where’s your family? You brought them back, where are they? Did you eat them?” but the current Spider-Man event “Hunted” revealed that Curt did not in fact eat them, Martha and Billy are fine and living in the swears now that they’re half-lizard monsters and I have questions.

First off the positive, Martha and Billy are finally being writing like people, instead of props to make Curt feel bad, which is good; also the comic seemingly retconned their transformation so it look voluntary, instead of Curt going down the rockers, which I like (see why I’m having issues with Hydra man here?). Now the questions: So Curt is teaching at the university while he and his family live in the swears, does no one question this? Next, Billy makes the incredibly good point that they live in the Marvel Universe where weird shit happens (also Mutants) so they can probably have a house; and I’m like “yes, Billy is absolutely right, you don’t have to live in the swears” you have a fucking job you should have a house. Also Curt at some point tells Peter and MJ that he stays in Lizard form around his family, because obviously, and I’m thinking it’s totally unfair that Curt can become human while Martha and Billy can’t since it’s his own fucking fault!

Anyway back to the plot, Billy is sick of living in the swears and he’s got an online friend, she invites him to her birthday party and like a good teenager he’s like fuck it and runs away to go to the party; things go bad at the party, he’s exposed as a lizard monsters and everyone freaks out, including the friends and it’s sad; and then Billy gets captured by the 2 guys that have been capturing animal themed characters for the event and thrown in a cell aw, and that’s where he’s at now. On a side note, I really hope at the end the friend sends Billy a message like “Was that really you Billy? I’m so sorry I freaked out, I didn’t mean to, I get that your a mutant I grew up in the Marvel and I get this things” and they reconciliate

On the Curt end, Martha is not doing anything, but they find out Billy is kidnapped and Curt goes to do something; and hey it’s the issue that just released today! Not gonna go too much into spoilers, but basically Curt makes his way into Kraven’s murderground and it’s Chris Bachalo! The guy who drew the story where Billy died! Such a nice callback, and the story remembers the Lizard killed Billy (and I’m still not sure how Billy is so chill around Curt, but whatever). And there’s another mention of Curt knowing people by their scent and I’m confused how he not knows Peter is Spider-man, he MUST KNOW Peter is Spider-man, they have the same scent! He totally knows Peter is Spider-man, he’s just faking to protect his identity.

So that’s it so far, I don’t know why I like this story so much but I do. I’ve never cared much for The Lizard, but he’s so interesting as Curt Connors in Lizard body, and I like his family (more than I like this dumbass). I’m really looking forward for the next chapter (also spoilers, but Curt poisons a supervillain and I dig that)

summary: Look! Another fic for today!! Anyway this is also kind of another sequels. It’s a sequel to this fic and it’s my fave ship. I...
body:
Trapped in the Cycle - greengreed - The Spectacular Spider-Man (Cartoon) [Archive of Our Own]

Look! Another fic for today!! Anyway this is also kind of another sequels. It’s a sequel to this fic and it’s my fave ship. I really enjoyed writing it! I really enjoy writing fics of my fave ship over anything else, plus they’re my two favorite Marvel characters sooo yeah!! Doubly good!

Enjoy, and give it a read if you’d like!


Summary:

Otto and Norman have been stuck in an unhealthy, toxic relationship where they spend no time together, other than in bed. Unknown to each other, they both have deeper feelings than what meets the surface.

Need to block antis or certain blogs check: *antis to block, #blogs to block, #blogs to report. Also tags you may need to blacklist if needed: #anti bs, #nsfw, #fandom wank.

summary: This! This is what I wanted to read for years! If they do a reboot of the Ultimate Universe, that’s what they should do, instead...
caption:
This! This is what I wanted to read for years!

If they do a reboot of the Ultimate Universe, that’s what they should do, instead of telling the same old stories with only cosmetic changes. Have smart and ambitious writers working on it, let the characters age, and adress the impact of super powers and super geniuses on the world.

(Also, did they imply that Sue droped Reed for Sponge Bob?)

Spider-Man: Life Story #2 (Zdarsky, Bagley, Hennessy, D’Armata)

summary:
As the only person who remembers Marvel Apes I am Not happy with Amazing Spider-Man 18.HU
First of Marty just fucking DIE, the...
body:
As the only person who remembers Marvel Apes I am Not happy with Amazing Spider-Man 18.HU

First of Marty just fucking DIE, the actual Marvel Apes isn’t actually mentioned at all!

I mean, the comic takes time to discuss Marty’s marriage to this snake themed supervillain, but Marty’s serious scientist girlfriend from Marvel Apes, Fiona Fitzhugh isn’t even mentioned! And all the comic says about the Ape World is that Marty felt normal there, not that he befriended Spider-Monkey, nor that the heroes were ruthless and cruel, nor that he and Fiona left because the world was too violent (and Captain America had been replaced by a vampire impostor), nor that they were exiled by the apes alongside that universe’s Speedball who later joined the Initiative (and is presumably still living in the Marvel Universe).

Absolutely nothing is there and the hero died as a looser that people laughs at. I am not happy, not happy at all
